PostgreSQL
insert into file_chunk_part (upload_id, chunk_id, part_number, e_tag, chunk_size, storage_path, upload_at) values (#{uploadId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chunkId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{partNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chunkSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{storagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploadAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update file_chunk_part set upload_id = #{uploadId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chunk_id = #{chunkId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, part_number = #{partNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, e_tag = #{eTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chunk_size = #{chunkSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, storage_path = #{storagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upload_at = #{uploadAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, upload_id, chunk_id, part_number, e_tag, chunk_size, storage_path, upload_at from file_chunk_part
